text: Use the celestial globe to alter the firmament and reveal the past.

title: Mission Description
content: Seliose's past seems to diverge greatly from what was told in bygone stories. Now, accompanied by her two mythical companion beasts from ages past, we stand poised to unveil the ancient and hidden truths.

text: (Approach the celestial globe behind Solabis, optional)

speaker: Solabis
line: Reveal its truth in order, heroes.

text: (Approach the celestial globe behind Lunabis, optional)

speaker: Lunabis
line: The sequence of historical events is already set...

speaker: Hyacine
line: ..."The turn of dawn and dusk, commanding the celestial globe..."

speaker: Hyacine
line: "Embrace the clouds, Celestial Mural."

speaker: Ruthless New Believer
line: Ha... look who we've caught — an old-fashioned disciple of the ancient god!

text: Witness the true history of the Skyfolk.

children.speaker: Ruthless New Believer
children.line: The frail Titan was conquered long ago by the mighty warrior goddess. Now they're nothing more than rusted scrap, left in the forge to decay over countless years.

children.speaker: Ruthless New Believer
children.line: Surrender to us, relic of a bygone era! We'll reshape your clouded mind and grant you a place alongside your kin in Seliose's glory...

children.speaker: Helpless Old Disciple
children.line: Your so-called "reshaping" is nothing more than torment, both in body and mind.

children.speaker: Helpless Old Disciple
children.line: No... I'd rather die than give in to hypocrites like you, hiding behind empty faith and wielding power as you please!

children.speaker: Ruthless New Believer
children.line: Hahaha! Take a good look at this pathetic fool! Do you see it? What a laughable hypocrite!

children.speaker: Ruthless New Believer
children.line: You're one of the Sunfolk, aren't you?

children.speaker: Ruthless New Believer
children.line: When you oppressed your own under the guise of faith, leaving countless souls to suffer endlessly under the scorching sun — did you ever consider that even the fiercest sun could one day fall?

children.speaker: Helpless Old Disciple
children.line: I... I once thought...

children.speaker: Ruthless New Believer
children.line: Spare us your empty excuses, relic of the old world. "I'd rather die than give in to hypocrites like you, hiding behind empty faith and wielding power as you please!" —

children.speaker: Ruthless New Believer
children.line: — You've already sentenced yourself. All we're doing is following through.

children.speaker: Ruthless New Believer
children.line: Do it. Make it clean. A single, sharp cut across the neck.

children.speaker: Helpless Old Disciple
children.line: No, no... NO!!!

children.speaker: Phainon
children.line: ...The creations shaped by Kephale in their image failed to inherit their compassion and acceptance.

children.speaker: Phainon
children.line: Are you alright, Hyacine?

children.speaker: Hyacine
children.line: I'm fine, Lord Phainon. I... expected this.

children.speaker: Hyacine
children.line: It's just... thinking about the vision Seliose held before declaring war on the Titan... this sight is deeply heartbreaking.

children.speaker: Hyacine
children.line: ...Let's move on.

children.speaker: Hyacine
children.line: Seliose's victory couldn't change her people. Some Skyfolk revered her as a new goddess, and began to oppress those unwilling to abandon their old beliefs...

children.speaker: Hyacine
children.line: The simple vision she carried with her before declaring war on the Titans... became an illusion.

children.speaker: Hyacine
children.line: Let's... keep going

speaker: Lunabis
line: Seliose possessed the strength to slay gods...

speaker: Lunabis
line: Yet, she failed to sever the cycle of karma rooted deeply in humanity's hearts.

speaker: Hyacine
line: ..."The turn of dawn and dusk, commanding the celestial globe..."

speaker: Hyacine
line: "Drive out the gods, Celestial Mural."

speaker: Dan Heng
line: Could that be...

speaker: Phainon
line: But... how is that possible?

text: Witness the true history of the Skyfolk.

children.speaker: Dispirited Old Believer
children.line: Please... help us, the forsaken Skyfolk...

children.speaker: Dispirited Old Believer
children.line: ...Lady Caenis, you are the strong one who follows the path of shadows.

children.speaker: Phainon
children.line: The "Cleaners"...! Did the Skyfolk conspire with them?

children.speaker: Dispirited Old Believer
children.line: Word has it you hunt those with golden blood, all in your quest to cleanse the world of the filth of those cursed offspring.

children.speaker: Dispirited Old Believer
children.line: Deliver justice for us. The witch with golden blood struck down the proud Eye of Twilight, desecrating their divine grace. Yet, it is we, the devout denizens of the sky, who are forced to pay the price!

children.speaker: "Caenis"
children.line: I can smell your despair, Skyfolk... The Cleaners are on the side of mortals. Together, we'll erase that blasphemous bloodline from this world.

children.speaker: "Caenis"
children.line: The Daythunder Knight and her fantastic creatures are far too strong. No one can hope to defeat them in a direct fight. But we'll show you every trick, every strategy you can use to turn the tide...

children.speaker: Phainon
children.line: In their desperation, those ancient disciples were willing to do anything — even ally themselves with the Cleaners.

children.speaker: Phainon
children.line: But I'm guessing their plan failed, didn't it?

children.speaker: Solabis
children.line: Those assassins were vicious, but not foolish. They never actually dared to attack Seliose.

children.speaker: Solabis
children.line: They weren't driven by any genuine desire to help the oppressed. Their true targets were the innocent Chrysos Heirs hidden among the Skyfolk.

children.speaker: Solabis
children.line: These schemes only came to light long after the damage was done.

children.speaker: Phainon
children.line: Before the Flame-Chase Journey began, the Chrysos Heirs waged war against each other over who was a "legitimate" heir of the prophecy. Even Tribbie's many selves were pulled into the chaos.

children.speaker: Phainon
children.line: At the time, golden blood was seen as a curse. Honestly? It's easy to see why.

children.speaker: Hyacine
children.line: But Seliose... where was she in all of this? What thoughts weighed on her mind as she watched everything unfold?

children.speaker: Hyacine
children.line: The oppressed old believers didn't hesitate to team up with the Cleaners, but those assassins had never thought of directly provoking the mighty Seliose. Instead, they trained their daggers on the innocent Chrysos Heirs hidden in the Skyfolk's midst...

children.speaker: Hyacine
children.line: Seliose... how exactly would she have felt to witness all this transpire?

speaker: Lunabis
line: You'll know very soon, Miss Hyacine.

speaker: Solabis
line: Her unconditional tolerance was met with ruthless betrayal.

speaker: Solabis
line: Her deep love for humanity was reduced to ashes... leaving behind only endless fury.

speaker: Hyacine
line: ..."The turn of dawn and dusk, commanding the celestial globe..."

speaker: Hyacine
line: "Reveal the history, Celestial Mural."

speaker: Phainon
line: Now, you have nowhere to hide... Titan.

speaker: Mem
line: Look, everyone, over there —

speaker: Hyacine
line: Are those... Lady Lunabis and Lord Solabis?

speaker: Phainon
line: Yes, those are remnants of their memories from a thousand years ago.

text: Witness the true history of the Skyfolk.

children.speaker: Indignant New Believer
children.line: Your Highness, what are you planning to do!?

children.speaker: Indignant New Believer
children.line: We are devout disciples of Lady Seliose... We would never betray her! It's those rats... they are the fools who backstabbed our hero!

children.speaker: Desperate Old Believer
children.line: Please spare us! We were blinded by hatred and misled by those people clothed in black.

children.speaker: Indignant New Believer
children.line: Punish them, Your Highness! Without these stubborn remnants of the past, the Skyfolk may finally stand united under the warrior goddess's banner!

children.speaker: Memory Solabis
children.line: The strong crush the weak, twisting faith into a tool for oppression.

children.speaker: Memory Lunabis
children.line: The weak rise to power, yet the cycle of hatred endures, unbroken through time.

children.speaker: Memory Solabis
children.line: Seliose has made her judgment —

children.speaker: Memory Lunabis
children.line: — The corruption within humanity is a sickness beyond cure.

children.speaker: Desperate Old Believer
children.line: Yet she once loved us with such fierce devotion...

children.speaker: Desperate Old Believer
children.line: Has she... given up on us?

children.speaker: Memory Solabis
children.line: Seliose touched the Coreflame and gained the vision of the Titan.

children.speaker: Memory Lunabis
children.line: She saw what the god fears — rooted in the darkness, spawning from the edge of the world, the black tide that devours all.

children.speaker: Memory Solabis
children.line: They flee from the clouds not out of favoritism toward the scorching sun, but merely out of fear of that boundless shadow.

children.speaker: Memory Lunabis
children.line: Yet humanity misinterpreted the god's intentions, forging them into weapons for fratricide...

children.speaker: Memory Lunabis
children.line: ...This history, brewed from sorrow and tragedy, shall end here.

children.speaker: Indignant New Believer
children.line: In the name of the warrior goddess...

children.speaker: Indignant New Believer
children.line: What kind of fate has she woven for us...?

children.speaker: Memory Solabis
children.line: We are here to deliver the message Seliose left for mortals —

children.speaker: Memory Solabis
children.line: "To my once beloved, yet now unsavable kin —"

children.speaker: Memory Solabis
children.line: "With golden divine blood coursing through me, even the Tyrant of the Sky bends to my unyielding light. My light burns far brighter than before, and the fog clouding my mind has finally lifted —"

children.speaker: Memory Lunabis
children.line: "I gaze upon this fragile earth through the god's hundred eyes, and resolution fills me. A hero's instinct drives me forward, compelling me to deliver your final judgment —"

children.speaker: Memory Solabis
children.line: "Your future flows between the boiling streams of the golden pool at your feet —"

children.speaker: Memory Lunabis
children.line: "Rejoice, for as everyone's flesh and blood merge with liquid gold —"

children.speaker: Solabis & Lunabis
children.line: "You will finally understand what true unity means."

children.speaker: Composed Old Believer
children.line: Ha... I've long seen this day coming.

children.speaker: Composed Old Believer
children.line: This isn't your fault, Seliose. Your only mistake...

children.speaker: Composed Old Believer
children.line: ...was placing far too much hope in humanity.

children.speaker: Hyacine
children.line: Lunabis, Solabis, you...

children.speaker: Solabis
children.line: Yes, we acted as Seliose's executioners.

children.speaker: Lunabis
children.line: That day, countless Skyfolk fell from the dome of the Eye of Twilight, swallowed by golden lava.

children.speaker: Lunabis
children.line: They spent their entire lives praying to the sky, yet their devotion never earned them wings to escape their fate.

children.text: Seliose... was like a completely different person.

children.speaker: Phainon
children.line: After learning about everything she went through...

children.speaker: Phainon
children.line: I can only feel regret... but I can't condemn her choice.

children.speaker: Phainon
children.line: After learning about everything she went through...

children.speaker: Phainon
children.line: ▶ I feel the same way as you, (Trailblazer).

children.speaker: Hyacine
children.line: If this is the true history — was Seliose's fusion with Aquila truly meant to save humanity from ruin?

children.speaker: Lunabis
children.line: By touching the Coreflame, Seliose gained insight into the Titan's fear... and glimpsed their cold indifference.

children.speaker: Lunabis
children.line: Aquila never yearned for mortal devotion. The establishment of the sky civilization was merely the result of humanity's own doing. The celestial globe, said to be gifted by the Titan to the Skyfolk in the myths, was in truth a creation of mortals.

children.speaker: Solabis
children.line: Disillusioned with humanity, Seliose began to long for the detachment of divinity. She sent Lunabis and me to the earth in search of a forbidden art said to fuse human and Titan souls.

children.speaker: Phainon
children.line: Professor Anaxa's alchemy already achieved such power a thousand years ago?

children.speaker: Hyacine
children.line: Seliose, who passed fatal judgment on the Skyfolk, had turned her back on humanity —

children.speaker: Hyacine
children.line: Seliose gave up on the children of humanity, and handed the Skyfolk a death sentence... throwing them into the boiling pool of gold beneath our feet...

children.speaker: Hyacine
children.line: ...And then she chose to merge with Aquila, casting aside once and for all the humanity that tormented her all her life.

speaker: Hyacine
line: If this was the path she chose, then whose wish have my ancestors and I been guarding all this time!?

speaker: Lunabis
line: The final fragment of history lies just ahead. Go and claim it, Miss Hyacine.

speaker: Lunabis
line: Just as Seliose once did, you must take this step too.

text: Speak with Hyacine and prepare to face the final truth

children.speaker: Hyacine
children.line: Seliose had abandoned her humanity... Then, my Twilight Courtyard ancestors... and me... Are we truly her descendants?

children.speaker: Hyacine
children.line: The truth will soon be revealed. No matter what... I will not run away from my mission.

children.speaker: Hyacine
children.line: Grayie, will you stand by my side?

text: Confront history and rise to challenge the gods!

children.speaker: Hyacine
children.line: Is that...

children.speaker: Unnamed Skyfolk
children.line: Great Seliose, I beg you — spare this humble life!

children.speaker: Unnamed Skyfolk
children.line: I've never harmed anyone... The punishment you deliver out of rage is far too harsh for someone innocent like me!

children.speaker: Memory Solabis
children.line: The time has come, mortal —

children.speaker: Memory Lunabis
children.line: — it's time to face your destiny.

children.speaker: Unnamed Skyfolk
children.line: Wait! Please, let me speak with Her Highness, the warrior goddess!

children.speaker: Unnamed Chrysos Heir
children.line: Look! Can you see it? Golden blood is spilling from my wounds! I am a Chrysos Heir too... chosen by the prophecy, just like Lady Seliose!

children.speaker: Memory Lunabis
children.line: She isn't lying...

children.speaker: Memory Lunabis
children.line: Seliose, what will you do with one of your own?

children.speaker: Seliose, Theos Synthetos
children.line: A Chrysos Heir...

children.speaker: Seliose, Theos Synthetos
children.line: You are no different from the rest.

children.speaker: Seliose, Theos Synthetos
children.line: You were once one of the Sunborn... Did you ever rise to defend the weak when your kin oppressed others under the guise of the Titan's favor?

children.speaker: Unnamed Chrysos Heir
children.line: I... did not.

children.speaker: Seliose, Theos Synthetos
children.line: You abandoned your old faith and made me your new god after Aquila's fall.

children.speaker: Seliose, Theos Synthetos
children.line: Did you offer your help when your comrades turned their blades on the faithful who refused to convert?

children.speaker: Unnamed Chrysos Heir
children.line: I... did not.

children.speaker: Seliose, Theos Synthetos
children.line: When the Prophecy of Genesis reached all beings, calling the Chrysos Heirs to become heroes of this fractured world...

children.speaker: Seliose, Theos Synthetos
children.line: ...did you overcome your inner weakness and heed its urgent call?

children.speaker: Unnamed Chrysos Heir
children.line: I... failed to do so.

children.speaker: Seliose, Theos Synthetos
children.line: Look, Chrysos Heir... you are no different from the rest...

children.speaker: Seliose, Theos Synthetos
children.line: My judgment is just — only burning gold can purify your sins...

children.speaker: Unnamed Chrysos Heir
children.line: ...Wait, Lady Seliose — please, grant me a moment to explain my cowardice!

children.speaker: Unnamed Chrysos Heir
children.line: Your divinity indeed casts our mediocrity in a harsh and unflattering light. Humanity has walked this earth for many ages, enduring life's struggles and witnessing its shameful imperfections...

children.speaker: Unnamed Chrysos Heir
children.line: Yet, despite everything, we built great city-states and thriving civilizations! Even when trapped in the mud of malice, we continued to struggle and push forward...

children.speaker: Unnamed Chrysos Heir
children.line: Because beyond our flaws, the virtue that we all share is tenacity!

children.speaker: Unnamed Chrysos Heir
children.line: Even if it means risking everything I have and everything I have yet to gain... I must kneel before you, begging for a chance at life. I need to prove that mortals are capable of redemption!

children.speaker: Memory Solabis
children.line: To admit your weakness in such a righteous manner... it seems you have completely abandoned your dignity.

children.speaker: Seliose, Theos Synthetos
children.line: You say you're willing to risk everything you've yet to gain...

children.speaker: Seliose, Theos Synthetos
children.line: Tell me... what kind of miraculous bet is that?

children.speaker: Unnamed Chrysos Heir
children.line: It's simple, Lady Seliose...

children.speaker: Unnamed Chrysos Heir
children.line: Should you grant me a chance at life, I will ensure that your epic is passed down through generations, sung by my descendants until the end times buries all civilizations and legends.

children.speaker: Unnamed Chrysos Heir
children.line: Should the Prophecy of Deliverance we've heard hold even the slightest chance of becoming reality...

children.speaker: Unnamed Chrysos Heir
children.line: Then my descendants will return here one day to prove to you that even the flawed and imperfect mortals you disdain can bear the weight of the world!

children.speaker: Seliose, Theos Synthetos
children.line: Ha... interesting.

children.speaker: Seliose, Theos Synthetos
children.line: Release her, Solabis, Lunabis.

children.speaker: Seliose, Theos Synthetos
children.line: From now on, she and her descendants will carry both the sky's blessing and the curse of their history. No matter how long it takes, I will wait for the one who is destined to arrive...

children.speaker: Seliose, Theos Synthetos
children.line: When that time comes, I'll take pleasure in mocking these mortal children on how their progenitress sold their unborn lives.

children.speaker: Phainon
children.line: The truth of the legend... is finally clear.

children.speaker: Phainon
children.line: Hyacinthia...

children.speaker: Hyacine
children.line: Am I... the descendant of that nameless Chrysos Heir?

children.speaker: Hyacine
children.line: Our lineage wasn't from the hero...

children.speaker: Hyacine
children.line: ...but from a nameless Chrysos Heir who begged for mercy before her.

children.speaker: Hyacine
children.line: My whole clan's fragile mortal life... was simply spared on Seliose's whim...

children.text: We must not yield to her scorn.

children.speaker: Phainon
children.line: Her judgment may be true — mortals do have their flaws. But even so, human dignity must not be trampled.

children.text: Humans aren't as contemptible as she thinks.

children.speaker: Phainon
children.line: She sees only the sins we've committed, but we will make her understand that it's not all we are.

children.text: Perhaps there's a trace of compassion left in her.

children.speaker: Phainon
children.line: She turned her back on humanity and embraced divinity... She believes we're not worth saving.

children.speaker: Hyacine
children.line: Lord Solabis, Lady Lunabis —

children.speaker: Hyacine
children.line: Tell me... did you wait for a thousand years at the Eye of Twilight... Just to witness that Chrysos Heir's child coming back to receive punishment?

children.speaker: Lunabis
children.line: ...Time alters everything, child.

children.speaker: Lunabis
children.line: Once upon a time, we had not yet learned to read the complexities of human nature, and Seliose's perspective was our only window into understanding humanity.

children.speaker: Solabis
children.line: Her words were everything to us: Our guide, comfort, command, and admonition.

children.speaker: Solabis
children.line: It wasn't until she fell silent that we learned to perceive humanity through our senses.

children.speaker: Lunabis
children.line: During our resistance against the black tide... we watched over the earth, observing the progress of the Flame-Chase Journey. We saw heroes embarking on a mission of deliverance from which they could not return.

children.speaker: Lunabis
children.line: The unity and hope Seliose couldn't see... we've witnessed in her place.

children.speaker: Solabis
children.line: We've changed, young Hyacinthia. Our watch isn't about proving humanity's weaknesses anymore...

children.speaker: Solabis
children.line: ...It's about waiting for the return of the light.

children.speaker: Hyacine
children.line: Lady Seliose! I want to tell you this! Doesn't matter if you can hear me or not!

children.speaker: Hyacine
children.line: I want you to know that I am glad to be born as the child of a nameless and ordinary mortal!

children.speaker: Hyacine
children.line: Only then can I prove to you that tenacious hope, buried in the deepest part of the human soul, has not been lost to time! It's just waiting to heal and grow, and then it will shine once more.

children.speaker: Hyacine
children.line: Even the most cowardly individual harbors a seed within. Perhaps in your era, the light on the horizon was too dim for it to sprout...

children.speaker: Hyacine
children.line: But do you see it now? A thousand years later, the path you forged is now walked by many brilliant heroes.

children.speaker: Hyacine
children.line: They love the people of this world unreservedly, willing to sacrifice themselves to shine a light upon the children of humanity.

children.speaker: Hyacine
children.line: The light they leave behind will inspire the seeds within people to sprout, grow, and thrive, nurturing them every step of the way.

children.speaker: Hyacine
children.line: Until the barren land is reborn as a thriving forest, growing endlessly, and one day... reaching for the sky once again.

children.speaker: Hyacine
children.line: That "twilight," still capable of being healed and protected in the end times... is the reason we choose to bear the weight of humanity's flaws.

children.speaker: Phainon
children.line: History has proven once again: The Flame-Chase Journey itself is a miracle —

children.speaker: Phainon
children.line: It began with a whitewashed lie, but it laid down a path of deliverance for humanity over thousands of years.

children.speaker: Phainon
children.line: Seliose, we have honored the promise made by that nameless Chrysos Heir and returned here. We also bring you the answer to your question —

children.speaker: Phainon
children.line: Mortals are capable of change... and humanity is worth saving!

children.speaker: Phainon
children.line: Our people, forging through the trials of the end times, deserve a second chance — we are worthy of a new dawn!

children.speaker: Phainon
children.line: Hyacine —

children.speaker: Hyacine
children.line: Yes! Solabis, Lunabis —

children.speaker: Solabis
children.line: We are here, Hyacinthia.

children.speaker: Lunabis
children.line: We are here, Miss Hyacine.

children.speaker: Hyacine
children.line: Give me your strength. I've made my decision, and we stand resolved.

children.speaker: Hyacine
children.line: For all that mortals have built, I will follow the guidance of the prophecy and claim the Coreflame of the Eye of Twilight —

children.speaker: Hyacine
children.line: The children of humanity have returned from the earth, and we... will challenge the skies once again!

text: Take a moment to gather your thoughts, Hyacine.

children.speaker: Hyacine
children.line: You're right... we all need some time to prepare.

children.speaker: Hyacine
children.line: This time, I will not be overwhelmed by the darkness of humanity.

children.speaker: Hyacine
children.line: Face us, avatar of Sky!

text: (Begin battle againstSublime, Radiant, Avatar of the Sky)

speaker: Phainon
line: Does this weather please you, Titan incarnate?

speaker: Phainon
line: Indulge in this, and taste the fiery blaze of Dawnmaker!

speaker: Hyacine
line: If you can still hear my voice, Lady Seliose —

speaker: Hyacine
line: Behold the strength of those who've pledged to save the world!

speaker: Dan Heng
line: The temperature is rising —

speaker: Dan Heng
line: We need to find a way to quench this heatwave!

html_content:
<dl><dt>(Interactive tutorial)</dt>
<dd>"Avatar of the Sky" increases the Temperature during its next action based on the "Helium Flash" value</dd>
<dd>Attack multiple enemy targets at the same time to quickly reduce their "Helium Flash" value</dd></dl>

text: (Sublime, Radiant, Avatar of the Sky uses Fury, Incineration of Dawn and Dusk)

speaker: Hyacine
line: They... they want to turn this place to scorched earth!

text: (When Sublime, Radiant, Avatar of the Sky is reduced to below 30% HP)

speaker: Hyacine
line: Give us the Coreflame...

speaker: Hyacine
line: ...At least, we can soothe the world's pain!

text: (When Sublime, Radiant, Avatar of the Sky is reduced to below 10% HP)

speaker: Phainon
line: I shall strike down the false sun!

text: (When Sublime, Radiant, Avatar of the Sky is reduced to 1% HP)

speaker: (Trailblazer)
line: ▶ Let's finish this! Slice off their wings!

speaker: Phainon
line: You, too, will be cleansed with gold!

children.speaker: (Trailblazer)
children.line: : Quick, behind me!

speaker: Dan Heng
line: The platform is plummeting fast!

speaker: Phainon
line: Stand firm! It's a long way down... Let's end them before we crash into the pool of gold!

speaker: Phainon
line: Storm clouds are gathering...

speaker: Phainon
line: Are you ready to sever the lightning?

html_content:
<dl><dt>(Interactive tutorial)</dt>
<dd>"Avatar of the Sky" additionally deals DMG during its next action based on the "Thundercloud" value</dd>
<dd>Attack enemy targets to quickly seize "Thundercloud" and deal DMG to "Avatar of the Sky" after its next action</dd></dl>

text: (When Sublime, Radiant, Avatar of the Sky is reduced to 1% HP again)

speaker: Phainon
line: There is another world waiting to be saved...

speaker: Phainon
line: We... have no intention of dying here with you!

children.speaker: Phainon
children.line: Titan —

children.speaker: Phainon
children.line: — Melt into nothing!

text: Use the Shrine of Prayers to Rewind the shattered platform

title: Step Description
content: After a fierce battle, Aquila plunged into the pool of gold, and their Coreflame was seamlessly claimed by Hyacine. Now, the urgent task is to flee the crumbling sky fortress before it collapses entirely.

speaker: Phainon
line: Aglaea...

speaker: Phainon
line: Are you... still protecting us?

speaker: Dan Heng
line: Look, Aquila's Coreflame —

speaker: Hyacine
line: Is it... all over now?

speaker: Hyacine
line: Seliose condemned humanity, casting them into the pool of gold. In the end, she too was...

speaker: Phainon
line: ...Take that Coreflame with you, Hyacine. Our mission isn't over.

speaker: Hyacine
line: Hmm... Coreflame of the sky, come with me...

text: Hyacine contains the Coreflame in her palm...

speaker: Hyacine
line: It's a strange feeling. It's so warm and... powerful.

speaker: Hyacine
line: Holding it in my hand, it feels like the winds of this world might turn for me... Summoning thunder or snow is just a thought away.

speaker: Phainon
line: I understand how you feel, but right now...

speaker: Phainon
line: ...this platform is on the brink of collapse. Who knows how much longer it can hold. We need to find a way to leave.

speaker: Phainon
line: Look, over there —

speaker: Dan Heng
line: A Time Priest's instrument. Does it still have any divine power left?

speaker: Phainon
line: No idea, but we have to take a gamble. If the prayer can rewind the shattered platform, then we might ride it back to the entrance...

speaker: Phainon
line: ...and also retrieve Aglaea's amulet.

speaker: Phainon
line: We can't delay any longer. Everyone, move quickly

speaker: Dan Heng
line: Is the Sky Castrum collapsing because of Aquila's fall?

speaker: Mem
line: The golden thread... is trembling...

speaker: Dan Heng
line: This device is too old. It might not work...

speaker: Phainon
line: ▶ We're out of time. We have to retrieve it... (Trailblazer), quickly!

speaker: Mem
line: "Lift the curtain of memory—"

speaker: (Trailblazer)
line: ▶ "—and stir up ripples of past reverie!"

children.speaker: (Trailblazer)
children.line: : This is bad. The prayer's power...

children.speaker: Phainion
children.line: : Come on... we have to get out of here.

children.speaker: Aglaea
children.line: : I shall have my final bath...

children.speaker: Aglaea
children.line: : ...in warm and radiant gold.

speaker: Aglaea
line: From here on, Phainon, you shall embark on a journey with no return.

speaker: Aglaea
line: Light fades only to await the sun's rise.

speaker: Aglaea
line: One day, you will step forward — not out of fear...

speaker: Aglaea & Phainon
line: ...but to return the dawn to this world.

speaker: Phainon
line: ...It's right in front of us.

speaker: Dan Heng
line: The platform has reset above us... We need to find a way up!

speaker: Phainon
line: This way, behind! That door leads outside —

speaker: Phainon
line: There's got to be a path!

text: Try using the Miracle Orb to pass through the curtain wall

speaker: Mem
line: A Miracle Orb! Let's use it to open our escape route!

children.speaker: Message Slate
children.line: Dear Seliose,

children.speaker: Message Slate
children.line: Are you okay? We haven't heard from you in so long...

children.speaker: Message Slate
children.line: We think we understand why you haven't replied, but we still wanted to leave these words here, just in case you see them, you know?

children.speaker: Message Slate
children.line: We are afraid this might be the last letter we ever write to you. Oleinus has sunk into an endless night, with dreadful creatures continuing to surge from the black tide, plunging the entire city in chaos.

children.speaker: Message Slate
children.line: Right now, I'm doing everything I can to help people escape. We have been guiding them through the Century Gate, sending them to Okhema, where our sister Tribbie is waiting.

children.speaker: Message Slate
children.line: Maintaining the Century Gate takes everything I have. Lately, it feels like we are getting smaller and smaller. And to make matters worse, the lord of Oleinus is still closing in on us ...

children.speaker: Message Slate
children.line: Yet we can't stop now. There are still so many people who need saving.

children.speaker: Message Slate
children.line: We have to get them to safety, far from the grasp of the black tide. It's something we can't turn away from. Any of our sisters would make the same choice without a second thought...

children.speaker: Message Slate
children.line: Dear Seliose — have you become a hero? We truly hope you've succeeded. If you have, perhaps more people will believe in the prophecy... and find the strength to stand together because of it.

children.speaker: Message Slate
children.line: We are so tired now. Maybe it's time for a little rest... and in our dreams, we will see Mama again, along with all our sisters...

children.speaker: Message Slate
children.line: — Missing you, Trissha

speaker: Mem
line: It worked! Let's go!

speaker: Hyacine
line: Phainon... Aglaea is...

speaker: Phainon
line: I know.

speaker: Phainon
line: I... know...

speaker: Dan Heng
line: That orb is blinking... We need to use it to open the gate!

speaker: Hyacine
line: Lightning and thunder...

speaker: Hyacine
line: The Celestial Mural is showing the end of the world.

children.speaker: Dan Heng
children.line: The mural's control over the weather was severed long ago. Whatever happens here shouldn't affect the world below... or so I hope.

text: On the contrary, the Flame-Chase Journey is on the verge of success.

children.speaker: Dan Heng
children.line: Aquila is the eleventh Coreflame of the Flame-Chase Journey. The final Coreflame of Kephale is enshrined in the council hall at Dawncloud.

speaker: Phainon
line: We're so close to achieving the miracle. Humanity will finally take control of its fate...

speaker: Phainon
line: ...as long as we can make it out of here!

text: Continue onward and escape the falling Cloudedge Bastion Ruins

speaker: Dan Heng
line: This path isn't as safe as it looks... Stay sharp and watch your step!

speaker: Hyacine
line: ...Argh!

speaker: Phainon
line: Watch out! Everything is collapsing, and a misstep could lead to a fall!

speaker: Hyacine
line: The door's frame is coming down!

speaker: Phainon
line: ▶ (Trailblazer) — give us a hand!

speaker: Phainon
line: ▶ (Trailblazer)... you do have a knack for saving the world!

speaker: Dan Heng
line: It's getting worse!

speaker: Phainon
line: ▶ Stay close to (Trailblazer)... Don't fall behind!

speaker: Dan Heng
line: The platform is just ahead!

speaker: Phainon
line: Hyacine, where are those winged beasts?

speaker: Hyacine
line: I'm trying to locate them, but the storm clouds on the mural are blocking my senses!

speaker: Hyacine
line: We could use their wings to escape if they were still here!

speaker: Phainon
line: We'll have to rely on our feet for now. Keep moving...

speaker: Phainon
line: ...We're not safe yet!

speaker: Mem
line: It's getting even more unstable...

speaker: Mem
line: Make sure you get the timing right!

speaker: Phainon
line: We're almost there. The end is just ahead. All we need is a rainbow bridge...

speaker: Hyacine
line: A West Wind Compass... leave it to me!

speaker: Hyacine
line: Focus, Hyacinthia! Stay focused...

speaker: Dan Heng
line: Why does this have to happen now...?

speaker: Hyacine
line: We're out of time. The fortress runs on Aquila's divine energy — if I can channel the Coreflame...

speaker: Hyacine
line: It worked! The Coreflame responded. Everyone, let's get out of here!

text: Ride the platform and return to the domed roof of the Cloudedge Bastion Ruins

speaker: Phainon
line: We all have something worth living for —

speaker: Phainon
line: And we all want to see Okhema's second dawn &md

speaker: Hyacine
line: Wait... what was that sound?

speaker: Phainon
line: Everyone — once the platform stops, we make a break for the exit...

speaker: Phainon
line: Don't hesitate, not even for a second!

speaker: Phainon
line: Everyone, hold on tight!

speaker: Dan Heng
line: Isn't that sound... How's that possible...

speaker: Phainon
line: No time for speculation...

speaker: Phainon
line: — Run!

children.speaker: Hyacine
children.line: The Titan?

children.speaker: Hyacine
children.line: But their Coreflame has already...

children.speaker: Hyacine
children.line: Could this be... Seliose...?

title: Step Description
content: The truth is extremely bitter — Seliose had long since lost all faith in her kin. Hyacine's bloodline leads back to an unnamed Chrysos Heir who escaped the purge, yet thankfully, she refused to let this black moment shape her. Now, we shall confront Aquila, Eye of Twilight, and bring closure to this saga of skies and predestination.

text: (Begin battle againstDecimator, Karma of Daythunder, Eye of Twilight

speaker: Phainon
line: That twisted form...

speaker: Phainon
line: Did the black tide bring them back to life?

speaker: Hyacine
line: The Coreflame has been taken, yet they still move...

speaker: Hyacine
line: Lady Seliose, is that you?

html_content:
<dl><dt>(Interactive tutorial)</dt>
<dd>"Eye of Twilight" deals a set amount of DMG based on "Black Tide Sync Rate"</dd></dl>

text: (Break Decimator, Karma of Daythunder, Eye of Twilight)

speaker: Dan Heng
line: Your curse ends here!

text: (Decimator, Karma of Daythunder, Eye of Twilight uses Eye of Terror)

speaker: Hyacine
line: I hear it, the echo of the apocalypse...

speaker: Hyacine
line: Stop, Lady Seliose!

text:
(Decimator, Karma of Daythunder, Eye of Twilight uses Unmaking Ashes: Godsfall)
(Cutscene begins)

children.speaker: Phainon
children.line: We must bring light to these dark times!

children.speaker: Hyacine
children.line: With just a glimmer of light...

children.speaker: Hyacine
children.line: I'll be able to pierce through the clouds...

children.speaker: Phainon
children.line: Use mine, Hyacine.

children.speaker: Phainon
children.line: I am...

children.speaker: Phainon
children.line: the one who bears the world—

children.speaker: Phainon
children.line: I am...

children.speaker: Phainon
children.line: the blazing sun, destined

children.speaker: Phainon
children.line: to rise!

speaker: Hyacine
line: Coreflame...

speaker: Hyacine
line: Bestow upon us the healing rainbow!

html_content:
<dl><dt>(Interactive tutorial)</dt>
<dd>"Healing Rainbow" can remove "Tide-Corrosion" state from all allies and restore HP for them.</dd></dl>

text: (When Decimator, Karma of Daythunder, Eye of Twilight is reduced to below 30% HP)

speaker: Dan Heng
line: Almost there... keep the momentum going!

speaker: Hyacine
line: Hero of the sky, awaken!

speaker: Hyacine
line: With humanity's tenacity...

speaker: Hyacine
line: ...we reject your judgment!

text: (When Decimator, Karma of Daythunder, Eye of Twilight is reduced to 1% HP)

speaker: Phainon
line: The first and only god that Dawnmaker will slay —

speaker: Phainon
line: — is you!

children.speaker: Dan Heng
children.line: Too far...

children.speaker: Dan Heng
children.line: We must stop them!

children.speaker: Hyacine
children.line: Heroes...

children.speaker: Hyacine
children.line: Help us!

children.speaker: Hyacine
children.line: Hero of the sky—

children.speaker: Hyacine
children.line: — witness

children.speaker: Hyacine
children.line: the will of humanity!

speaker: Seliose's Voice
line: Children of humanity... you have overturned the judgment I once cast in disillusionment.

speaker: Seliose's Voice
line: Beginning with a lie disguised as a heroic legend, passed down for millennia , a grand epic of creation has been written...

speaker: Seliose's Voice
line: ...You are worthy of a new dawn.
